indri 0.1.0

Aggregate across time

Source: R/aggregate.R
aggregate.Rd

Aggregate across time

Usage

aggregate(
  data,
  var,
  scale,
  ...,
  id = NULL,
  index = NULL,
  na.rm = TRUE,
  new_name = ".agg"
)

Arguments

data

a data frame

var

the variable to aggregate along

scale

the time scale to aggregate

...

ignore

id

the site identifier

index

the temporal identifier

na.rm

logical, whether to remove the pending NAs when aggregated

new_name

output name

Value

a data frame with the variable specified aggregated in scale

Examples

# first 11 NA rows are removed unless specified through na.rm = FALSE
tenterfield %>%
  init(id = id, time = ym, indicators = prcp:tavg) %>%
  aggregate(var = prcp, scale = 12)
#> Removing the pending NAs due to aggregation
#> $data
#> # A tibble: 358 × 8
#>    id                ym  prcp  tmax   tmin  tavg  .agg .scale
#>    <chr>          <mth> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>
#>  1 ASN00056032 1990 Dec   640  30.4 14.7   22.6   8382     12
#>  2 ASN00056032 1991 Jan  1108  27.5 15.9   21.7   8608     12
#>  3 ASN00056032 1991 Feb   628  28.0 15.5   21.8   7976     12
#>  4 ASN00056032 1991 Mar   204  26.2 11.8   19.0   7926     12
#>  5 ASN00056032 1991 Apr    44  24.2  6.57  15.4   6376     12
#>  6 ASN00056032 1991 May   630  21.3  7.52  14.4   5786     12
#>  7 ASN00056032 1991 Jun   242  19.6  3.65  11.6   5634     12
#>  8 ASN00056032 1991 Jul   580  15.3  0.519  7.91  5596     12
#>  9 ASN00056032 1991 Aug    14  17.8  1.67   9.76  5276     12
#> 10 ASN00056032 1991 Sep    78  21.1  3.07  12.1   5088     12
#> # … with 348 more rows
#> 
#> $roles
#> # A tibble: 8 × 2
#>   variables roles       
#>   <chr>     <chr>       
#> 1 id        id          
#> 2 ym        time        
#> 3 prcp      indicators  
#> 4 tmax      indicators  
#> 5 tmin      indicators  
#> 6 tavg      indicators  
#> 7 .agg      intermediate
#> 8 .scale    parameter   
#> 
#> $op
#> # A tibble: 1 × 6
#>   module   step      var   args  val   res  
#>   <chr>    <chr>     <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>
#> 1 temporal aggregate prcp  scale 12    .agg 
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "indri" "list" 

# with multiple scales
tenterfield %>%
  init(id = id, time = ym, indicators = prcp:tavg) %>%
  aggregate(var = prcp, scale = c(12, 24))
#> Removing the pending NAs due to aggregation
#> $data
#> # A tibble: 704 × 8
#>    id                ym  prcp  tmax   tmin  tavg .scale  .agg
#>    <chr>          <mth> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 ASN00056032 1990 Dec   640  30.4 14.7   22.6      12  8382
#>  2 ASN00056032 1991 Jan  1108  27.5 15.9   21.7      12  8608
#>  3 ASN00056032 1991 Feb   628  28.0 15.5   21.8      12  7976
#>  4 ASN00056032 1991 Mar   204  26.2 11.8   19.0      12  7926
#>  5 ASN00056032 1991 Apr    44  24.2  6.57  15.4      12  6376
#>  6 ASN00056032 1991 May   630  21.3  7.52  14.4      12  5786
#>  7 ASN00056032 1991 Jun   242  19.6  3.65  11.6      12  5634

#>  9 ASN00056032 1991 Aug    14  17.8  1.67   9.76     12  5276
